channel.title: Docker on Mark Arneman
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Mark Arneman

item.title: My Docker Compose Files
item.description: I created a public GitHub repo to be informational and used as a reference for others when creating and managing multiple docker-compose files with Traefik acting as a reverse proxy. I run my containers on an Alpine Linux virtual machine. Check it out over on GitHub: https://github.com/bearlikelion/docker-compose Containers Container Description Additional BitWarden_rs Password manager Hub Matomo Website Analytics Hub Media Automated media server - Deluge Jackett Radarr Sonarr ReadMe Netdata Performance monitoring Hub Nextcloud A safe home for all your data Hub OpenVPN OpenVPN Server Work in progress Organizr HTPC/Homelab services organizer Hub Pi-hole Network based ad blocker Hub - Website Relay Tor Relay Server Hub Teamspeak Teamspeak 3 Server Hub Traefik Traefik reverse proxy Hub - Docs Warrior Archive Team warrior Hub Watchtower Container auto-updates Hub
